import React from 'react' import styles from './Product.module.css' import bag from './bag.png' import { useState } from 'react' const Product = (props) => { const [cart, setCart] = useState({ button: 'ADD', state: outOfCart }) function changeCart(e) { e.preventDefault(); setCart({ button: 'ADDED', state: inCart }) } return (
{props.colors} COLORS
{props.title}
{cart.button}
) } export default Product
